Package main.Strategy

Class UniformGroup

java.lang.Object
main.Strategy.UniformGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourcePolicy
public class UniformGroup extends Object implements ResourcePolicy
The UniformGroup class represents a resource policy for selecting invokers in a uniform group manner.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UniformGroup(int groupSize)
    Constructs a UniformGroup with the specified group size.

    Method

    Resets the state of the resource policy.
    Invoker
    selectInvoker(List<Invoker> invokers, Action action)
    Selects an invoker from the provided list of invokers to execute the given action in a uniform group manner.

  • Constructor Details

    • UniformGroup

      public UniformGroup(int groupSize)
      Constructs a UniformGroup with the specified group size.
      Parameters:
      groupSize - the size of the uniform group
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the group size is invalid (less than or equal to zero)

  • Method Details

    • selectInvoker

      public Invoker selectInvoker(List<Invoker> invokers, Action action)
      Selects an invoker from the provided list of invokers to execute the given action in a uniform group manner.
      Specified by:
      selectInvoker in interface ResourcePolicy
      Parameters:
      invokers - the list of available invokers
      action - the action to be executed
      Returns:
      the selected invoker
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if no invoker has enough memory to execute the action

      public void reset()
      Resets the state of the resource policy.
